text: Adrian David Hugh Bivar (abbreviated A.D.H. Bivar) (1926 - 2015) was a British numismatist and archaeologist, who was Emeritus Professor of Iranian Studies at the School of Oriental and African Studies, University of London.EnWiki.NET - Encyclopædia Britannica Ultimate (2010). Adrian David Hugh Bivar. Retrieved on 2010-04-17. He specialized in Sasanian seals and rock reliefs, Kushano- Sasanian coins and chronology, Mithraic iconography, Arsacid history and pre- Islamic folklore.Encyclopaedia Iranica (2010). Iranian Studies in Britain, Pre-Islamic. Retrieved on 2010-04-17. His written works include book chapters written for the Fischer Weltgeschichte (vol.16, 1966) and The Cambridge History of Iran (1983). ==References== ==External links== * Bibliography of A.D.H.
